scripts.build-current: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run save-current
scripts.build-last: npm run clean && git checkout HEAD && npm run build && npm run save-last && git checkout -
scripts.build-two-commits-ago: npm run clean && git checkout HEAD~1 && npm run build && npm run save-two-commits-ago && git checkout -
scripts.build-all: npm run prepare-build-dir && npm run build-current && npm run build-last && npm run build-two-commits-ago
